column4: why dose my computer say "Media Change: please insert the disc labelled `ubuntu-server 7.04 _Feisty Faw_ - release i386 (20070415)` in the drive `/c
you have a cd in your /etc/apt/sources.list I guess and its wanting the package off of there. You can remove the cd from system > admin > software sources
then remove the cdrom line manually from /etc/apt/sources.list
im using ubuntu server--- so i hawent got x...
use your favourite text editor to remove the apt-cdrom line from /etc/apt/sources.list
how do i open it in temenal?
how do i open sources.list in the temenal so i cane change in it...
I reckon you should be using a gui until you're competent on the command line
